components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays When Sending Messages to Taiwan Far EasTone Direct

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending messages to Taiwan Far EasTone Direct. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Beeline Network in Kyrgyzstan

Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Deleting Historical Calls Not Being Registered in Database

incident_updates.body: The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers isn't fully recovered yet. Our engineers continue to work to ensure fully stability. We'll provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers isn't fully recovered yet. Our engineers continue to work to ensure fully stability. We'll provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers isn't fully recovered yet. Our engineers continue to work to ensure fully stability. We'll provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers isn't fully recovered yet. Our engineers continue to work to ensure fully stability. We'll provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers isn't fully recovered yet. Our engineers continue to work to ensure fully stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

After monitoring for some time, we've seen that the issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers isn't fully recovered. Our engineers continue to work to ensure stability. We'll provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers is now operating normally. We will continue monitoring to ensure system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers. Customers may be able to delete completed calls but those records are not being applied to the database. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with deleted calls in database. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in US is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 00:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 06:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures from and to a subset of Twilio US phone numbers

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting an emergency maintenance from 5 December 2022 at 05:00 PDT until 5 December 2022 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 12:00 PST through to 26 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
06 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
07 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 07 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
12 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 12 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
14 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 14 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
19 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 19 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
21 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 21 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
26 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 26 December 2022 at 16:00 PST

The Beeline network in Kazakhstan is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 14:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Kazakhstan handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 14:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Maintenance - Stour Marine

incident_updates.body: The Stour Marine network in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 15:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Stour Marine UK handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 16:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers.

The Megafon Network Operator in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2022 at 13:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries via a subset of longcodes.

Germany,
Spain,
United Kingdom,
Brazil.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2022 at 14:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 00:30 PST until 07 December 2022 at 01:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays receiving incoming SMS from Australia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 07 December 2022 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 08 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 08 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, December 10th, 2022, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours 30 minutes. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance from 14 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 15 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.
